alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 10:44AM CDT until July 16 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Delta County in north central Texas... Western Lamar County in north central Texas... Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1043 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ravenna, or 7 miles north of Bonham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Bonham, Leonard, Honey Grove, Ector, Roxton, Dodd City, Ravenna, Lake Bonham, Randolph, Pat Mayse Lake, Bonham State Park, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Coffee Mill Lake, Lake Crook, Camp Maxey, Forest Hill and Boyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
